system.description:
Though not especially common anymore, crossbows were once a widespread form of weapon across the isles.

Today, their quiet operation and versatility has them used by highly-skilled specialists rather than soldiers. The ability to operate almost silently makes them valuable when stealth is essential, and they can employ a wide variety of different projectiles for differing effects.

Other crossbow-like weapons also exist, from the compact wristbow to the electrically-powered voltaic gun.
